short.eng: An unlikely trio travel through time in order to battle unknown criminals and protect history as we know it
short.may: An unlikely trio travel through time in order to battle unknown criminals and protect history as we know it

long.eng: Timeless tells the story of a mysterious criminal who steals a secret state-of-the-art time machine, intent on destroying America as we know it by changing the past. The only hope is an unexpected team: a scientist, a soldier and a history professor, who must use the machine's prototype to travel back in time to critical events.
